issues.description: Zero clicks on 3825 content entries - content not reaching audience
Zero clicks on 11167 campaign entries - affiliate links not working

root_causes.cause: No sales from products and no clicks on affiliate links
Content syndication failed on Twitter, reducing the potential audience reach
Affiliate links may not be functioning or visible to users

fixes.expected_impact: Increase in content reach and potential clicks
implementation_steps: Investigate the issue with Twitter API or posting window
Implement a fix or workaround
Test content syndication to Twitter
Monitor the number of content syndications and clicks

fixes.action: Check functionality and visibility of affiliate links
fixes.expected_impact: Increase in campaign clicks and potential revenue
implementation_steps: Verify that affiliate links are correctly embedded in content
Test the functionality of affiliate links
Ensure that affiliate links are visible and enticing to users
Monitor the number of campaign clicks and conversions

fixes.expected_impact: Increase in product sales and revenue
implementation_steps: Evaluate the visibility and attractiveness of products on the platform
Implement changes to improve product listings, such as better descriptions or images
Consider promotional strategies, such as discounts or featured listings
Monitor the number of product views, sales, and revenue
